text: Peter Joseph Noozhumurry Varghese (born 1956) is an Australian diplomat and public servant. He has been the Secretary of the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade since 3 December 2012. Varghese was born in Kenya to Nasrani parents from Kerala, India. He moved to Australia as a child in 1964. He studied history and graduated from the University of Queensland. He is married and has a son. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Australian ministers for Foreign Affairs Category:Australian diplomats Category:Order of Australia Category:Malayali people
title: Peter Varghese
